fields.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
fields.description: +400 Health +20 Magic Resist +10% Cooldown Reduction UNIQUE Active: Grants a shield to nearby allies for 5 seconds that absorbs up to 50 (+10 per level) damage (60 second cooldown). UNIQUE Aura - Legion: Grants nearby allies +20 Magic Resist and +75% Base Health Regen. (Unique Auras with the same name don't stack.)
